name: iVanpires Discover Free
description:
FREE WITH ADS

Version without ads: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ivanpires-discover/id734824751

Game to find vampires in the various game screens. The game has 3 levels of difficulty (easy, medium and hard). The game has a ranking for the best players. Each hit or speak the user wins or loses points, the game consists of a timer that gives a final score of bonus to the user.
